rules.name: Accurate x
rules.description: You can retain up to x attack dice as normal successes without rolling them. If a weapon has multiple instances, treat it as Accurate 2.

rules.name: Balanced
rules.description: You can re-roll one of your attack dice.

rules.name: Blast x
rules.description: After shooting the primary target, shoot against each secondary target visible to and within x of the primary target (e.g., Blast 2"). Secondary targets are valid regardless of a Conceal order.

rules.name: Brutal
rules.description: Your opponent can only block with critical successes.

rules.name: Ceaseless
rules.description: You can re-roll any of your attack dice results of one specific result (e.g., all results of 2).

rules.name: Devastating x
rules.description: Each retained critical success immediately inflicts x damage on the operative. If the rule includes a distance (e.g., 1" Devastating x), inflict that damage on the target and every other operative visible within that distance.

rules.name: Heavy
rules.description: An operative cannot move in the same activation or counteraction it uses this weapon, and vice versa. If specified as 'Heavy (x only)', only that specific move action is allowed.

rules.name: Hot
rules.description: After using this weapon, roll one D6: if the result is lower than the weapon's Hit stat, the operative takes damage equal to the result multiplied by two.

rules.name: Lethal x+
rules.description: Attack dice results equal to or greater than x are critical successes (e.g., Lethal 5+).

rules.name: Limited x
rules.description: The weapon can only be used a number of times equal to x during the battle.

rules.name: Piercing x
rules.description: The defender rolls x fewer defence dice. 'Piercing Crits x' only applies if you retain critical successes.

rules.name: Punishing
rules.description: If you retain any critical successes, you can retain one failed die as a normal success instead of discarding it.

rules.name: Range x
rules.description: Only operatives within distance x of the active operative can be valid targets.

rules.name: Relentless
rules.description: You can re-roll any of your attack dice.

rules.name: Rending
rules.description: If you retain any critical successes, you can change one retained normal success into a critical success.

rules.name: Saturate
rules.description: The defender cannot retain cover saves against this weapon.

rules.name: Seek
rules.description: When selecting targets, operatives with a Conceal order cannot use terrain for cover. 'Seek Light' only ignores Light terrain for cover.

rules.name: Severe
rules.description: If you do not retain any critical successes, you can change one normal success into a critical success.

rules.name: Shock
rules.description: The first time you strike with a critical success in a sequence, discard one of the opponent's unresolved normal successes (or a critical if no normal successes remain).

rules.name: Silent
rules.description: The operative can perform a Shoot action with this weapon even while it has a Conceal order.

rules.name: Stun
rules.description: If you retain any critical successes, subtract 1 from the target operative's APL stat until the end of its next activation.

rules.name: Torrent x
rules.description: Select a primary target, then shoot against any number of other valid targets within distance x of that target (but not within control range of your friendly operatives).

rules.name: Poison
rules.description: On a successful hit, inflicts a Poison token.

rules.name: Toxic
rules.description: If target has a Poison token, add 1 to both Normal and Critical damage stats.
